summary: No longer do you have to burden one of your hands with a torch, or deal with that bright sterile light from candle light spell. Introducing the Floating Torch Spell!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v738/bl3azy/FTS_zps5aae0d19.png[/img]




[size=4]Its a spell with the same magicka, and duration cost as the candlelight spell, without having to deal with a glaring white sterile light. Check out the Video to see it in action.


[/size]

[youtube]u6reGFOZ_8w[/youtube]
[youtube]ZUBOxjtSL_c[/youtube]
[youtube]RBN805FPVUE[/youtube]




[size=5]Spell-Alteration

[/size][size=4]Stats- Extremely Useful

A hot flaming stick of wood consistently close to your face, but trust me, it's safe!

[/size]Update- in version 1.1 you will also be able to cast a floating lantern and floating fireball.  Also craft able rings for a constant effect.


[size=6]Where is it?
[/size][size=3]It's not gonna be easy, but I'll give you a clue

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v738/bl3azy/DragonsReach_zpsfba995f3.jpg[/img]

[/size]
[size=6]Enjoy![/size]
author: bL3azy
